Affluent.description: Affluent worlds are rich in natural resources and have a high standard of living. They are often industrialized and produce a lot of manufactured goods.

Asphalt.description: Asphalt worlds are covered in roads and highways. They are often industrialized and produce a lot of manufactured goods.

Automobiles.description: Automobile worlds are covered in roads and highways. They are often industrialized and produce a lot of manufactured goods.
